sentence.Network_en: We therefore investigated whether hypercoagulability mediates a beneficial effect during denovo atherogenesis.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此我们研究了高凝在原位动脉粥样硬化形成中是否介导了有益的作用.

sentence.Network_en: The present study aimed to characterize the contribution of CD 40 signaling to atherogenesis.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explicate the effect of vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) on the atherogenesis.
